alert.note: Alert for Clay; Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 11:27PM CDT until October 13 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Oktibbeha County in northeastern Mississippi... Clay County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1127 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Prairie to near Trebloc to 6 miles west of Montpelier, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Griffith and Pala Alto around 1145 PM CDT. West Point and Muldrow around 1155 PM CDT. Tibbee around 1200 AM CDT. Waverly around 1210 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
